description.english: Unlock every aesthetic modification (module, livery, paintjob)
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le modifiche estetiche (modulo, livrea, verniciatura)
description.french: Déverrouiller toutes les modifications esthétiques (modules, livrées, peintures)
description.german: Schalte jede Ästhetik-Modifikation frei (Modul, Motiv, Lackierung)
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las modificaciones estéticas (módulos, decoraciones y pinturas)
description.portuguese: Desbloqueia todas as modificações estéticas (módulos, decorações, pinturas)
description.polish: Odblokuj wszystkie modyfikacje estetyczne (moduły, okleiny, lakierowania)
description.russian: Открой все дизайнерские предметы (модули, раскраски и краски).
description.turkish: Tüm estetik modifikasyonların (modül, kostüm, boya işi) kilidini açın
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as modificações estéticas (módulos, estampas, pinturas)
description.tchinese: 解鎖所有裝飾修改（模組、車貼、烤漆）
description.schinese: 解锁每一套装饰模组（模块、制服和喷绘）
description.koreana: 모든 장식 개조 잠금 해제(모듈, 디자인, 도색 작업)
description.japanese: オーセンティックの改造を全てアンロックしよう（モジュール、記章、塗装）

description.english: Get pole position in a qualifier
description.italian: Ottieni la pole position in una qualificazione
description.french: Arriver en pole position à la fin des qualifications
description.german: Sichere dir die Pole Position in einer Qualifikation
description.spanish: Consigue la pole en una clasificatoria
description.portuguese: Consegue uma pole position numa qualificação
description.polish: Zakwalifikuj się do startu z pierwszego pola
description.brazilian: Conquiste a pole-position numa qualificação
description.japanese: 予選通過者の中でポールポジションになろう

description.english: Get a grandslam (pole, led every lap, fastest lap, win race)
description.italian: Ottieni un Grande Slam (pole, primo in ogni giro, giro più veloce, vinci la gara)
description.french: Réussir un grand Chelem (pole position, premier à chaque tour, tour le plus rapide, victoire finale)
description.german: Hol dir einen Grand Slam (Pole Position, Führung in jeder Runde, schnellste Runde, Rennen gewinnen)
description.spanish: Consigue un gran slam (pole, en cabeza en todas las vueltas, vuelta rápida y victoria)
description.portuguese: Consegue um grandslam (pole, melhor em todas as voltas, volta mais rápida, vitória na corrida)
description.polish: Start z pierwszego pola, prowadzenie w każdym okrążeniu, najszybsze okrążenie i zwycięstwo w rajdzie
description.russian: Займи поул-позицию, лидируй в каждом круге, покажи лучшее время в круге и выиграй гонку.
description.turkish: Bir mükemmel galibiyet edinin (zirve, tüm turlarda birincilik, en hızlı tur, yarış galibiyeti)
description.brazilian: Conquiste o grandslam (pole, liderança em todas as voltas, volta mais rápida, vitória)
description.tchinese: 獲得大滿貫（竿位、每圈領先、單圈最快、贏得比賽）
description.schinese: 获得大满贯（杆位、每圈领先、最快圈速和竞赛获胜）
description.koreana: 그랜드 슬램 달성(폴, 모든 랩 선두, 최단 랩 시간, 레이스 승리)
description.japanese: グランドスラムを達成しよう（ポール、全てのラップ通過、最速ラップ、レースに勝利）

description.english: Win a race with a 0.01 seconds lead
description.italian: Vinci una gara con un vantaggio di 0,01 secondi
description.french: Gagner une course avec 0,01 s d'avance
description.german: Gewinne ein Rennen mit einem Vorsprung von 0,01 Sekunden
description.spanish: Gana una carrera con una ventaja de 0,01 s
description.portuguese: Ganha uma corrida com 0,01 s de avanço
description.polish: Wygraj w rajdzie z 0,01 s przewagi
description.russian: Выиграй гонку, вырвавшись вперед на 0,01 секунды.
description.brazilian: Vença uma corrida com uma vantagem de 0,01 s
description.tchinese: 以0.01秒的領先優勢贏一場比賽
description.schinese: 以0.01秒的领先赢得一场竞赛
description.japanese: 0.01秒リードしてレースに勝利しよう

description.english: Win a race after having qualified in last place
description.italian: Vinci una gara dopo esserti qualificato all'ultimo posto
description.french: Gagner une course après avoir fini à la dernière place des qualifications
description.german: Gewinne ein Rennen nach einem letzten Platz in der Qualifikation
description.spanish: Gana una carrera tras haberte clasificado en último lugar
description.portuguese: Ganha uma corrida depois de te teres qualificado em último lugar
description.polish: Wygraj w rajdzie po ukończeniu kwalifikacji na ostatnim miejscu
description.russian: Займи последнее место в квалификации, а затем выиграй гонку.
description.turkish: Son sırada başladığınız bir yarışı kazanın
description.brazilian: Vença uma corrida depois de largar em último lugar
description.tchinese: 以最後一名完成資格賽後贏得一場比賽
description.schinese: 在资格赛中取得最后一名的情况下赢得竞赛
description.koreana: 마지막으로 예선전을 통과한 후 레이스 승리
description.japanese: 最下位だったレースに勝利しよう

description.english: Cross the finish line at 1500 kph (932 mph) or higher
description.italian: Taglia il traguardo ad almeno 1500 km/h
description.french: Franchir la ligne d'arrivée à 1500 km/h ou plus
description.german: Überquere die Ziellinie mit mindestens 1500 km/h
description.spanish: Cruza la línea de meta a 1500 km/h o más
description.portuguese: Atravessa a linha da meta a 1500 km/h ou mais
description.polish: Przekrocz metę z prędkością co najmniej 1500 km/h
description.russian: Пересеки финишную черту на скорости не менее 1500 км/ч.
description.turkish: Bitiş çizgisini 1500 km/sa veya daha yüksek bir hızda geçin
description.brazilian: Cruze a linha de chegada a 1.500 km/h ou mais
description.tchinese: 以每小時1500公里以上的速度越過終點線
description.schinese: 以1500公里时速或更高速度飞过终点线
description.japanese: 時速1500km以上でゴールしよう

displayName.english: Running at the speed of sound
displayName.french: Courir à la vitesse du son

description.portuguese: Faz uma média de velocidade de 1234kph num evento
description.polish: Jedź w wydarzeniu ze średnią prędkością 1234 km/h
description.russian: Достигни скорости в 1234 км/ч в событии.
description.turkish: Bir etkinlikte 1234 km/sa ortalama hız yapın
description.brazilian: Atinja a média de 1.234 km/h num evento
description.tchinese: 在一場賽事中的平均速度為每小時1234公里
